org.jacp.api.annotations.perspective

Annotation Type Perspective


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Perspective
    Defines the meta attributes for a perspective.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] components
      Define all component id's which belongs to perspective.
      java.lang.String id
      The perspective id.
      java.lang.String name
      The perspective name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean active
      The active state at start time.
      java.lang.String localeID
      Represents the Locale ID. see: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/locales-137662.html
      java.lang.String resourceBundleLocation
      Represents the location of your resource bundle file.
      java.lang.String viewLocation
      Represents the location (URI) of the declarative UI.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The perspective name.
        Returns:
        The perspective name.

      • id

        public abstract java.lang.String id
        The perspective id.
        Returns:
        The perspective Id

      • components

        public abstract java.lang.String[] components
        Define all component id's which belongs to perspective.
        Returns:
        all related component ids

      • active

        public abstract boolean active
        The active state at start time.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true

      • viewLocation

        public abstract java.lang.String viewLocation
        Represents the location (URI) of the declarative UI.
        Returns:
        The view location (like bundle.messages)
        Default:
        ""

      • resourceBundleLocation

        public abstract java.lang.String resourceBundleLocation
        Represents the location of your resource bundle file.
        Returns:
        The default resource bundle location (like bundle.messages)
        Default:
        ""

      • localeID

        public abstract java.lang.String localeID
        Represents the Locale ID. see: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/locales-137662.html
        Returns:
        The default locale Id
        Default:
        ""
